channel.title: Economic Conditions on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Economic Conditions on FinanClub

item.title: GGB
item.description: score:178 Chances: Gerdau’s stock has been upgraded to a Zacks Rank #2 (Buy), reflecting growing optimism about the company’s earnings prospects, which could drive the stock higher in the near term. Stocks like GGB are attracting investor attention due to their higher dividend yields compared to the industry.

item.title: ET
item.description: score:890 Chances: Energy Transfer reports strong performance in operations with record volumes, including NGL exports. Ares Capital offers a high dividend yield of nearly 9.7%, attracting investors seeking income. Energy Transfer’s expanded operations in the Permian Basin and strong export volumes likely benefit Q2 earnings.
